cause.description:
The North Korean government has controlled all aspects of their own people lives. The people have no freedoms or human rights, as most goverment money is invested into their military programs. Many people are starving and have devolped severe malnutrition. Already North Koreans tend to be on average, 4 inches shorter than South Koreans! To help free North Korea from its governmental stanglehold, the world must take a step forward to realize the threat of Kim Jong-Il. Support the South Korean goverment to relieve the pressure and become united once again so that relatives on both sides may meet each other again.
1. Stop North Korea Nucler Weapons Programs
2. End the Communist Rule
3. Unite both North and South Korea
4. Demilitarize North Korea's Military
cause.name: FANKC
